data.name: Tactic Legends
data.detailed_description:
Tactic Legends is a free-to-play, player-vs-player turn-based strategy game for mobile, inspired by games such as Final Fantasy Tactics and Tactics Ogre. Characters and environmental objects are 2D, while the game maps are in a 3D rotatable space.

Tactic Legends will re-imagine the classic game genre to be faster paced, with easy to learn but hard to master game mechanics and multiplayer focused gameplay.

No Ads, and No Pay-to-Win Mechanics. Ever.

I hate pay-to-win games, and I'm sure you do too. A player who spends real world money in-game will not have a power edge over another player. Premium items are primarily cosmetic and time-savers (battle pass exp boost, etc).

Tactic Legends is designed so that players who never spend a dime have the opportunity to unlock and acquire everything the game has to offer.

Battle System

Players take turns based on the speed of their characters. During your characters turn, you can:

  • Move your character (or undo your move)
  • Use one item
  • Use a basic attack OR an ability
  • Using an ability will cost action points (AP) based on the ability used. Moving, using basic attacks, or items will not cost AP. One AP is restored at the start of each turn.

Quick Time Events - Strategy Meets Skill


Your reflexes determine how powerful your attacks are, or if you miss altogether!

Quick time events (QTE) allow you an opportunity to increase the potency of your attacks and abilities. QTE's have random properties and will never have the same speed or sweet spots, and you also have a limited amount of time to complete the challenge.

QTE's allow skilled players to gain a slight advantage and move up in the ranks more quickly.

In this demo, the QTE for basic attacks is a meter that you have to stop in 2 cycles or less. Each color sweet spot determines how powerful your attack is:

Blue - Critical hit (max damage + bonus)
Green - Strong hit (max damage)
Yellow - Decent hit (random value between minimum and maximum damage)
Orange - Weak hit (minimum damage)
Red - Miss

There are plans for a variety of minigame QTE's for other abilities that may alter other properties besides just damage potency. Stay tuned for more information!

If you have any ideas for interesting QTE's, let us know in the Discord server!

Item System

Each character can only bring up to 4 items with them into battle (8 for Túnji). Your inventory of items is not shared between characters in-battle. You'll have to strategize and make careful plan of which items you want to send with each character.



Currently there are over 70 items designed with varying effects and rarity. Almost every item in Tactic Legends is consumable, and Koji can steal your items, so be careful what you choose to bring with you!

You'll be able to replenish your inventory of items by winning matches, leveling up your battle pass, or spending in-game currency at the item shop which refreshes its inventory every 24-hours.

Complete Quests for Loot

Daily quests provide you with special opportunities to collect additional items and cosmetics. From the home menu, you'll be able to manage your characters, inventory, browse the item shop, communicate with friends and more!

Unlockable cosmetic items include: character skins, voice taunts, account badges, and more.

If you have any ideas for interesting unlockables, let us know in the Discord server!

Battle Pass vs. Legend Pass

  • Battle Pass - Resets to level 1 every 30 days. Level up your battle pass by winning matches and gaining exp. Most levels of an item pass unlock various cosmetics, loot boxes, game items, currency (including premium) and more
  • Legend Pass - Premium battle pass subscription that increases the number of rewards you get for each level. Obtain additional game items after each match and provide an item reward bonus to every non-legend pass holder you play with! Additional cosmetic perks are planned for Legend Pass holders.

Assemble Your Team of 5 From a Growing Roster




Protect your allies from enemy attacks with highly defensive abilities. Chip may be slow, but incredible strength lies behind his broadsword!



  • Increased max health, highest physical defense
  • Lowest turn priority, movement range, and jump height
  • Protects allies by absorbing incoming damage in their place


Quickly maneuver around the arena and steal items from other players! The best kind of fetch involves the loot of your enemies.

  • Fast movement priority and range
  • Items stolen are yours to keep, assuming you survive the match!
  • Low defense, moderate damage


Support your team through soothing song magic! The right note will have your enemies succumb to your charm and do thy bidding.

  • Area-of-effect support abilities (healing, buffing)
  • Charm allows you to take control of an enemy character for a limited time
  • Low defense and damage


Big flashy spells delivered in a pint-sized package. Be careful not to get too close... his skin is also poisonous!



  • High magical damage and vertical height movement
  • Low physical defense and physical damage
  • Poisonous skin inflicts damage-over-time to melee attackers


His ice lance allows him to do melee damage from a further distance than other characters, and hits slow down his enemies.



  • Melee attacks can be performed from 2 tiles away
  • Moderate movement and damage
  • Abilities do ice damage and slow opponents, lowering their turn priority


Knock your enemies in, or out, of position to setup big plays. Armora can curl into a ball for defense or roll into enemies for an offensive strategy.

  • Great movement and defense
  • Low damage
  • Can position enemy players into advantageous locations!


Overwhelm your opponent with raw strength. When Ozaru's health drops too low, you might just see his final form...

  • Increased max health, high physical damage
  • Low defense
  • Damage increases as health decreases


Carry up to 8 items into battle and use them from a distance with his slingshot! The ultimate item hoarder... just watch out for Koji.

  • Can hold double the normal number of items, and can use them at range
  • Ranged attacks
  • Low movement and damage



Counterattack and make your enemies regret their decisions. Itza thrives in watered down environments!

  • High physical damage
  • Increased movement capability on water/wet tiles
  • Counter melee attackers



She is small, but she is fierce... elemental arrows allow Rin to call upon whatever force the situation calls for. Position onto the high ground for increased range!

  • Longest range attacks, moderate damage
  • Variety of elemental magic abilities
  • Unable to attack from close range, low defense

Customize With Cosmetics

Cosmetics include character recolors, skins, voice taunts, badges and more

Dynamic Arena Environments

Map lighting is randomized, and can range from sunrises, rainy days, sunsets, nighttime and more. Some tiles may even have special elemental properties based on weather or skill effects...





Positioning Matters

Not all characters have the same movement capabilities, both horizontally and vertically. Increase the range and power of your abilities by taking high ground. Trap your opponents by blocking their path.

Attacking from different sides of your enemies may provide you with a bonus to damage or an easier quick time event!

Over 244+ Hours of Development Live Streamed!

I've been working on this project since January 2021, and I have the live streams to prove it! You can checkout past streams and watch how the game has evolved and been developed or tune it to my next stream and say hello!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
